attributes.action: do the right thing and resign and call an election now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how many more mistakes does this government have to make before the penny drops that they aren't capable of the job? they are embarrassing themselves as they plods from one disaster to another.Today it was the Ghurkas (well done)last week it was the budget whilst those in and around labour rob us blind with ficticious expense claims. time for a change mr prime minister-call an election now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
